message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be very valuable to you.  I'm thinking of a price around $1,900,000 to start. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While $1,400,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to be flexible. How about we settle on $1,700,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $1,600,000?
